required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Deproteinized Bovine Bone Mixed With Injectable Platelet Rich Fibrin Versus a Sole Deproteinized Bovine Bone "TUTOGEN BONE" in Sinus Floor Elevation With Simultaneous Implant Placement. A Randomized Clinical Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Deproteinized Bovine Bone Mixed With Injectable Platelet Rich Fibrin Versus a Sole Deproteinized Bovine Bone "TUTOGEN BONE" in Sinus Floor Elevation With Simultaneous Implant Placement. A Randomized Clinical Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: 28 recruited patients indicated for sinus floor elevation with simultaneous implant placement . they were divided into two groups. first group was assigned for placement of deproteinized bovine bone solely, while the other group was assigned for the placement of mixture of injectable platelet rich fibrin with deproteinized bovine bone into the sinus after implant placement.

primary_outcome.description: evaluation of postoperative complications in terms of pain and edema using patient pain chart

secondary_outcome.time_frame: will be measured intraoperatively immediately after insertion of the implant and will be measured one more time 6 months after the first operation at time of implant exposure
secondary_outcome.description: measurement of implant stability using osstell device

secondary_outcome.measure: height of bone gained around the implant
secondary_outcome.description: two cone beam computed tomography (CBCT) will be taken one immediate postoperative and the other 6 months after the first operation then the height of bone gained around the implant will be assessed by superimposing the same sections in the two CBCT

Bone density will be measured by calculating the difference in the Hounsfield unit (HU) in the bone around the implants in the immediate postoperative CBCT (within one week) and the CBCT after 6 months.

arm_group.arm_group_label: sinus lift, implant placement, sole bovine bone
arm_group.description: sinus floor elevation with simultaneous implant placement together with grafting the sinus with a deproteinized bovine bone solely.

arm_group.arm_group_label: sinus lift, implant placement, injectable PRF + bovine bone
arm_group.description: sinus floor elevation with simultaneous implant placement together with grafting the sinus with a mixture of injectable platelet rich fibrin with a deproteinized bovine bone.

intervention.intervention_name: sinus lift, implant placement, sole bovine bone
intervention.description: sinus lift augmentation with a sole deproteinized bovine bone with simultaneous implant placement
intervention.arm_group_label: sinus lift, implant placement, sole bovine bone

intervention.intervention_name: sinus lift, implant placement, injectable PRF + bovine bone
intervention.description: sinus lift augmentation with a mixture of injectable platelet rich fibrin plus a deproteinized bovine bone with simultaneous implant placement
intervention.arm_group_label: sinus lift, implant placement, injectable PRF + bovine bone

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients requiring implants in maxilla and have atrophic bone regarding the length due to sinus pneumatiztion. Length 3: 7 mm .
Exclusion Criteria:
1. General contraindications for implant
2. Systemic diseases that might affect the healing of bone
3. Patients with sinus pathology

clinical_study.keyword: sinus lift, injectable platelet rich fibrin, sticky bone, bovine bone
